question: a new shopping centre has opened in your town, and you are going there on Saturday. Write a 120-word letter to your English friend Rosie
text: I am writing to tell you about my birthplace, Ho Chi Minh City. I have been living since I was born and it has been 25 years equaling my age. Overall, this place is a strategic place for the economics constructed a number of financial buildings such as banks, retailers and real estate businesses making it becomes the center of entire Vietnam’s economy.

Besides commercial aspects, Ho Chi Minh City is also eminent due to its local tourist attractions. It has many historical sites namely The Reunification Palace and The Immaculate Conception Cathedral Basilica. The former is an image being significant for putting the end to The Vietnam War, and the latter is famous due to its astonishing French architecture.

Ho Chi Minh City also boasts amazing and superb cuisine. This is a place where convergence is applied, which means that you can have food from all cultures ranging from Western to parts of Vietnam, from North to South.
Another impressive point is that this city has only 2 seasons: humid and dry. Raining appears from June to December and sunny reigns for the other half.
How is your hometown, I am looking forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: The spelling of center is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
